titleStmt.title: To all fathers of noble families, and lovers of vertue.
titleStmt.author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.

notesStmt.note: An advertisement for Sir Balthazar Gerbier's academy, which "was to give instructions in all manner of subjects, from philosophy, languages, and mathematics, to riding the 'great horse', dancing and fencing. It was opened on 19 July 1649 at Gerbier's house at Bethnal Green"--cf. DNB.
Annotation on Thomason copy (669.f.14[46]): "Sr Balthazar Gerbier June 28 1648".
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
